"Well I am happy to have a friend amongst my new founded god hood. Even if I enjoyed destroying the Earth and Jupiter." Chaud told him as he high fived Lan. Both of them ignored the fact that they were growing in size.

"I thought you wiped everyone out because you wanted too." Lan told him as he chuckled, thankful they weren't going to fight about being Gods.

Lan and Chaud closed their eyes and concentrated fully on the sun. Power began to feed into them as the giant ball of gas erupted its power. It didn't take long for the sun to be completely absorbed into them. They opened their eyes, now holding hands, and grew. Within seconds they expanded from the Milky Way, and continued up. Galaxy after galaxy appeared in their eyes and disappeared just as quickly. Planets, stars, asteriods, black holes, all of these things and more came into sight and were quickly shrunk out of sight. Lan and Chaud grinned and suddenly found their backs pressing against something. They could feel the edges of the Universe, like being encased in a giant eggshell.

"Here we go!" Lan said grinning as cracks formed around them.

"This is the final step!" Chaud said, grinning back.

The Universe's walls shattered.

Lan and Chaud looked around them and saw nothing but darkness.

"Why is it dark?" Lan said. "I thought we broke out of the Universe."

"I think what we did was the equivalent of a Big Bang. The Universe ended. Now another can begin."

"We should get started."

He was right. They watched as light from their bodies pierced the darkness. In amazement they watched as tiny egg formed between them. Inside the egg the Universe began again. Or maybe it just resumed living. Either way, Chaud and Lan brought the egg up to their eyes and looked in. Slowly the Universe took shape again. They both breathed on the egg and watched as life entered. They sat the egg down nearby. It would grow on its own now. They smiled contendly at one another.

"Now what?" Lan said.

Chaud patted the egg and said, "We can play with this later maybe."

"But for now?" Lan said, moving in closer.

"For now...you're mine."

And so they moved close together and kissed. Their bodies warmth lent warmth to the egg and light spread throughout the tiny Universe.

Inside, the Universe was subtlely changed. Here and there in the Universe some things were the same and in others, things were different. Lan and Chaud's images left their mark and a different society appeared on the New Earth.

And Lan and Chaud lived on eternally in peace, the Universe better for their prescense.

1312122112111122.content:
The cosmos itself seemed to shudder as Lan and Chaud began absorbing the Sun-- the golden aura of their bodies intensified into a brilliant iridescence, and the great ball of gas began to slowly shrink, its energies draining into the two growing gods with each second. The feeling was incredible, and both of them moaned out in sheer pleasure as solar power suffused into every cell of their bodies...and all the while, they grew, their bodies stretching bigger in all directions while their muscles swelled and bloated, and their throbbing members pulsed thicker and harder. They held hands all the way, watching as planets, stars, and nebulae shrank smaller and smaller around them, and as the sun offered up its last reserves of energy, the lovers felt that true godhood was at last upon them...

For a moment, at least.

Lan's eyes suddenly shot open as a twinge of something resembling fear went down his spine. All around him was darkness...not the comforting, calm darkness of the void, but a tense, frightening cloak of stygian black filled with unknown threats.

"Hey...hey, Chaud, something's wrong!" he said, trying to shake his companion out of his pleasant reverie. "I think we're lost or something...we need to stop!"

The other giant seemed annoyed, opening one eye and glaring at Lan.

"What, are you backing out now? When we stand on the precipice of true godhood?! Nothing can stand in our way, all will be consumed by--"

"Dude-- snap OUT of it, okay?! I think we're in trouble-- aaaahh!!" At that moment, both boys suddenly found themselves yanked downward by the cruel hold of gravity, and as they fell from an incomprehensible height, the darkness around them gave way to the blinding light of twin suns...the two were being drawn toward a mysterious, gargantuan planet, seemingly bigger than entire star systems and situated in a strange realm beyond known space. The land around them was a vast desert, and as the two lovers fell from orbit they began to catch fire-- they were unharmed, of course, thanks to their new powers, but the feeling of going from "ascension" to being at the mercy of Newton's laws was a humbling experience, at best.

Eventually, they landed with meteoric force in the centre of a vast series of dunes, creating a giant mushroom cloud of sand and digging themselves into a deep crater. Lan was the first to get back up, pulling himself out of the crater and looking out across the desert, shaken but no worse for the wear. Both had seemed to stop growing for the time being, though their eyes and skin still glowed faintly with golden power.

"Damn...what IS this place?" the brunette asked out loud, while Chaud slowly pulled himself to his own feet, spitting out a mouthful of alien sand.

"It's-- ptuh!-- an insult, is what it is! We were so close...I could FEEL godhood within our grasp, but then this...this...PLACE appeared. Mocking us, tearing the promise of ultimate power away from our deserving-- !" At this point, Lan reached out and placed a finger over Chaud's mouth, clearly having had just about enough of his tantrum.

"Okay, dude...I admit the whole 'godly' act is a HUGE turn-on, but maybe stow it for now? Whatever we were doing, we're stuck here now, and we gotta figure out what's going on..." Chaud's face fell, but Lan reached out a hand to his cheek and looked him in the eye, his expression one of pure love. "It's okay...I still want to ascend together with you-- it just looks like we gotta work a little harder for it, okay?"

"Mm...well, okay," he replied after a short pause, leaning in to peck his boyfriend on the lips. "I guess there's no way to go but forward from here..." And that they did, setting out in a random direction across the strange desert...it was a small consolation, at least, that Chaud was able to admire Lan's inhumanly sexy body the whole way-- both were, of course, completely naked, sporting muscles that would put the biggest of bodybuilders to shame, and immense, swinging cocks that hung past their knees and flopped about with each powerful step. Intentionally hanging back to the rear, he was also able to get a good look at Lan's tight, shapely, round ass...maybe a little more time on this mortal plane wouldn't be so bad.
